meanings.definition: A person who works in an automobile factory.
meanings.sent1: The autoworkers assembled cars on the factory line.
meanings.sent2: Many autoworkers in the plant wear protective gear.
meanings.sent3: The autoworkers joked about racing each other in the parking lot.
meanings.sent4: The synchronized movements of the autoworkers resembled a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The sound of tools echoed through the factory as the autoworkers diligently worked.

meanings.sent1: The autoworkers gathered for a meeting to discuss their concerns.
meanings.sent2: Several autoworkers received awards for their dedication to quality.
meanings.sent3: During the break, the autoworkers shared stories about their families.
meanings.sent4: The autoworkers' unity was evident in their joint efforts to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The autoworkers' teamwork was crucial in meeting production deadlines.
